56779.en:
<voice 00125_00056779><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>Ooh, <pc>! It's a good thing that you came!
It's terrible, terrible, terrible, I tell ya!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56779.ja:
<voice 00125_00056779><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「おおっ　<pc>さん！
　いいところに　来てくださった！
　大変　大変　大変なんじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56779.ko:
<voice 00125_00056779><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc> 씨!
　마침 잘 왔네!
　정말, 정말, 정말 큰일이 났어!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56779.zh-Hans:
<voice 00125_00056779><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>哦哦，<pc>！
你来的正好！
出事了！出事了！出事了！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56779.zh-Hant:
<voice 00125_00056779><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>！
你來得正是時候！
出大事了！出大事了！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56780.en:
<voice 00165_00056780><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>You remember Little Rugina here? The other day, you
got the Hot Spring Flower for me; she's the caretaker
of Monsero Hot Spring Ravine.<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56780.ja:
<voice 00165_00056780><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「ここにいる　ルジナちゃんを　覚えておるかの？
　この前　湯の花を取りにいってもらった
　モンセロ温泉峡にある　温泉の管理人じゃよ。<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56780.ko:
<voice 00165_00056780><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 내 옆에 있는 루지나는 기억하지?
　일전에 탕의 꽃을 받으러 갔던
　몽세로 온천골의 온천 관리인 말일세.<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56780.zh-Hans:
<voice 00165_00056780><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>你还记得这位卢吉娜吗？
就是之前你去取温泉精华时
蒙赛罗温泉峡谷的管理人。<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56780.zh-Hant:
<voice 00165_00056780><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>你還記得盧吉娜嗎？
她是之前你去取溫泉精華時，
蒙賽羅溫泉峽谷的管理人。<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56781.en:
<voice 00195_00056781><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>Thanks to that Hot Spring Flower, the pain in my back
disappeared. And I left on foot to visit Rugina at the hot
springs, but...<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56781.ja:
<voice 00195_00056781><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「湯の花のおかげで　腰の痛みが消えたからな。
　わしも　ルジナちゃんに会いにいこうと
　自分の足で　あの温泉へ行ってきたんじゃが……<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56781.ko:
<voice 00195_00056781><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 탕의 꽃 덕분에 요통이 사라져서
　나도 루지나를 만나러
　직접 그 온천에 다녀왔는데……<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56781.zh-Hans:
<voice 00195_00056781><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>多亏了温泉精华，我的腰已经不痛了。
我想去见一见卢吉娜，
就自己去了那个温泉……<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56781.zh-Hant:
<voice 00195_00056781><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>多虧了溫泉精華，我的腰痛也好了。
我也想靠自己的雙腳
去溫泉見盧吉娜，可是……<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56782.en:
<voice 00245_00056782><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>And to my surprise, there I happened upon obviously
evil, ferocious-looking monsters!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56782.ja:
<voice 00245_00056782><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「なんと　そこで　見るからに邪悪で
　凶暴そうな魔物と　出くわしたんじゃよ！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56782.ko:
<voice 00245_00056782><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 글쎄, 거기서 척 보기에도 사악하고
　흉포한 마물과 맞닥뜨렸지 뭔가!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56782.zh-Hans:
<voice 00245_00056782><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>但没想到在那里遇见了
看起来就非常邪恶凶暴的怪物！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56782.zh-Hant:
<voice 00245_00056782><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>那裡竟然有
凶神惡煞的怪物出現！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56783.en:
<voice 00310_00056783><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>It's true, y'know... To think that monsters appeared in
that tranquil hot spring; up until now, it's never
happened.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56783.ja:
<voice 00310_00056783><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>「本当にねえ……。
　あの　のどかな温泉に　魔物が現れるなんて
　これまで　一度も　なかったことですよ。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56783.ko:
<voice 00310_00056783><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>: 정말이지…….
　그 평화로운 온천에 마물이 나타나다니
　이런 일은 처음이에요.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56783.zh-Hans:
<voice 00310_00056783><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>这事真是……
以前那个宁静的温泉
从来都没有出现过怪物。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56783.zh-Hant:
<voice 00310_00056783><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>其實呢……
怪物從來沒在
那個和平的溫泉出現過。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56784.en: <voice 00340_00056784><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>Recently, young girls have been coming to see the hot springs, so I'm worried that they might be scared to come here without knowing that the monster has been released...<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56784.ja:
<voice 00340_00056784><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>「最近は　あの温泉を目当てに　若い娘さんたちも
　来てくれてたから　魔物が出たのを知らずに来て
　怖い目に　あっていないか　心配だわ……。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56784.ko:
<voice 00340_00056784><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>: 요새는 온천을 즐기러 젊은 아가씨들이
　오기도 하는데, 마물이 있는지 모르고
　갔다가 무서운 일을 겪을까 걱정이에요…….<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56784.zh-Hans:
<voice 00340_00056784><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>最近有很多年轻的女孩子为了温泉而来，
但她们并不知道有怪物出现。
我很担心女孩们会不会遇到危险……<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56784.zh-Hant:
<voice 00340_00056784><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>最近有許多年輕的女孩為了溫泉而來，
但她們並不知道此處有怪物出沒，
我擔心她們會遭遇危險……<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56785.en: <voice 00400_00056785><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>Mmm-hmm! I let the gals go, but I don't know what's going on now, we don't know. The gals may be wantin' saving!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56785.ja:
<voice 00400_00056785><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「うむ！　その場にいたギャルたちは　逃がしたが
　今　どういう状況になっておるかは　わからん。
　ギャルが　助けを求めておるかもしれんのじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56785.ko:
<voice 00400_00056785><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 그렇지! 그 자리에 있던 걸들은 피신시켰지만
　지금은 상황이 어떻게 변했을지 알 수 없네.
　어쩌면 도움이 필요한 걸들이 있을지도 몰라!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56785.zh-Hans:
<voice 00400_00056785><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>嗯！我让当时在场的女孩子们都逃走了。
现在是个什么情况我也不知道。
女孩子们也许正在寻求帮助！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56785.zh-Hant:
<voice 00400_00056785><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>嗯！在場的辣妹們都逃走了，
但不知道現在情況如何。
辣妹們可能正在呼救！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56786.en:
<voice 00460_00056786><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001><pc>, please, please! Go to Monsero Hot Spring
Ravine, defeat the monsters, to protect the gals and the
peaceful hot springs!!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56786.ja:
<voice 00460_00056786><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん！　どうか　頼む！
　モンセロ温泉峡の温泉に行って　魔物を倒し
　ギャルと　平和な温泉を　守ってくれい！！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56786.ko:
<voice 00460_00056786><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨! 제발 부탁일세!
　몽세로 온천골의 온천으로 가 마물을 해치우고
　걸들과 평화로운 온천을 지켜 주게!!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56786.zh-Hans:
<voice 00460_00056786><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001><pc>！拜托你了！
请去蒙赛罗温泉峡谷的温泉打倒怪物，
守护女孩子与温泉的和平吧！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56786.zh-Hant:
<voice 00460_00056786><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001><pc>！拜託你了！
請你去蒙賽羅溫泉峽谷的溫泉打倒怪物，
守護辣妹與和平的溫泉吧！！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56787.en:
<voice 00557_00056787><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>Ooh! What a reassuring reply! For the hot spring
loving sexy gals, I eagerly hope you will go out there
and defeat those monsters!!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56787.ja:
<voice 00557_00056787><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「おおっ！　なんという　心強い返事じゃ！
　温泉を愛する　セクシーギャルたちのために
　はりきって　魔物を倒してきてくだされよ！！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56787.ko:
<voice 00557_00056787><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 오오! 참으로 든든한 대답이구먼!
　온천을 사랑하는 섹시 걸들을 위해
　열심히 마물을 해치워 주게나!!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56787.zh-Hans:
<voice 00557_00056787><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>哦！你这么回答我就安心了！
为了喜爱温泉的性感女孩，
你要努力打倒怪物啊！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56787.zh-Hant:
<voice 00557_00056787><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>喔喔！真是給我打了一記強心針！
為了喜愛溫泉的性感辣妹們，
請打起精神打倒那些怪物吧！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

56788.en:
<voice 00642_00056788><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>As you probably know, Monsero Hot Spring Ravine is
southwest of Coniware Plain! Please be careful when
you go theeere!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56788.ja:
<voice 00642_00056788><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「わかっておると思うが　モンセロ温泉峡は
　コニウェア平原の　南西にあるからの！
　気をつけて　行ってきてくだされよ～！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56788.ko:
<voice 00642_00056788><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 잘 알겠지만 몽세로 온천골은
　코니웨어 평원 남서쪽에 있네!
　조심해서 다녀오게나~!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56788.zh-Hans:
<voice 00642_00056788><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>我想你应该知道，蒙赛罗温泉峡谷就在
柯尼威亚平原的西南方向！
你一路上要小心啊！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56788.zh-Hant:
<voice 00642_00056788><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>我想你應該知道，蒙賽羅溫泉峽谷
就在柯尼威亞平原的西南方！
路上小心喔～～！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56789.en:
<voice 00692_00056789><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>Ooh! What a reassuring reply!... Is what I think, but
currently, you don't seem to have the room to take
on another request.<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56789.ja:
<voice 00692_00056789><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「おおっ！　なんという　心強い返事じゃ！
　……と思ったが　今の　お前さんには
　他の頼みごとを受ける余裕が　なさそうじゃの。<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56789.ko:
<voice 00692_00056789><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 오오! 참으로 든든한 대답이구먼!
　……이라고 생각했는데 지금 자네는
　다른 부탁을 들어줄 여유가 없어 보이는구먼.<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56789.zh-Hans:
<voice 00692_00056789><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>哦！你这么回答我就安心了！
……我虽然是这么想，但是你现在
已经没有余力接受其他的委托了。<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56789.zh-Hant:
<voice 00692_00056789><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>喔喔！真是給我打了一記強心針！
……我是很想這麼說，
但你現在好像沒有時間接其他委託了。<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56790.en: <voice 00754_00056790><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>But we are also asking you to do something for us! For the sake of all the sexy gals who love hot springs, please come back as soon as you can!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56790.ja:
<voice 00754_00056790><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「じゃが　わしらの頼みも　切実じゃ！
　温泉を愛する　セクシーギャルたちのために
　なるべく早く手を空けて　戻ってきてくれい！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56790.ko:
<voice 00754_00056790><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 하지만 내 부탁도 한시가 급하네!
　온천을 사랑하는 섹시 걸들을 위해
　최대한 빨리 짬을 내서 돌아와 주게!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56790.zh-Hans:
<voice 00754_00056790><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>但我们也是诚恳地在拜托你！
为了喜爱温泉的性感女孩，
请尽快腾出时间回到这里吧！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56790.zh-Hant:
<voice 00754_00056790><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>不過我的委託也很急！
為了喜愛溫泉的性感辣妹們，
快解決手邊的事回到這裡吧！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56791.en:
<voice 00801_00056791><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>NO... Whaddaya mean, "No"...? If the monsters stay in
those hot springs, gals won't be coming there, will they...<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56791.ja:
<voice 00801_00056791><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「な……　断るじゃと……？
　あの温泉に　魔物が居座れば　ギャルたちが
　寄り付かなくなってしまうではないか……。<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56791.ko:
<voice 00801_00056791><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 이럴 수가…… 거절하는 겐가……?
　그 온천에 마물이 버티고 있으면
　걸들이 온천욕을 하러 못 올 것 아닌가…….<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56791.zh-Hans:
<voice 00801_00056791><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>什……你要拒绝？
如果怪物一直在温泉那里不走，
女孩子们不就不能靠近温泉了吗……<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56791.zh-Hant:
<voice 00801_00056791><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>什麼……你拒絕……？
要是怪物一直占據溫泉，
辣妹們不就不敢靠近了嗎……<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56792.en: <voice 00883_00056792><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>My retirement pleasure... *sob* *sob*...<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56792.ja:
<voice 00883_00056792><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「わしの　老後の楽しみがぁ……。
　うっうっ……。<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56792.ko:
<voice 00883_00056792><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 내 노후의 즐거움이…….
　으으…….<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56792.zh-Hans:
<voice 00883_00056792><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>我晚年的乐趣啊……
呜呜……<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56792.zh-Hant:
<voice 00883_00056792><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>我老年的樂趣啊……
唔唔……<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56793.en: <voice 00120_00056793><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>Ooh, <pc>! I'm glad you're here again!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56793.ja:
<voice 00120_00056793><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「おおっ　<pc>さん！
　また　こうして来てくださるとは！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56793.ko:
<voice 00120_00056793><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc> 씨!
　다시 와 줄 줄이야!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56793.zh-Hans:
<voice 00120_00056793><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>哦哦，<pc>！
没想到你还会回来！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56793.zh-Hant:
<voice 00120_00056793><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>！
沒想到你又來了！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56794.en: <voice 00150_00056794><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>Will you do me a favor this time? An evil and vicious monster has appeared in the hot springs of Monsero Hot Spring Ravine, which is managed by Rugina!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56794.ja:
<voice 00150_00056794><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「今度こそ　頼みを聞いてくれるのかの？

　温泉に　邪悪で凶暴な魔物が　現れたんじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00150_00056794><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 이번엔 내 부탁을 들어줄 텐가?
　루지나가 관리하는 몽세로 온천골의
　온천에 사악하고 흉포한 마물이 나타났네!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56794.zh-Hans:

56794.zh-Hant:
<voice 00150_00056794><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>這次你願意接受委託嗎？
盧吉娜管理的蒙賽羅溫泉峽谷的溫泉，
有殘酷而兇悍的怪物出現！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56795.en: <voice 00197_00056795><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>It really is. We've never had a monster come there before. I'm sure some of the daughters will come without knowing.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

　きっと知らずに来る　娘さんも　いると思うわ。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56795.ko:
<voice 00197_00056795><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>: 정말이지……. 그 온천에 마물이 나타나다니

　모르고 찾아오는 아가씨들이 있을 거예요.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56795.zh-Hans:
<voice 00197_00056795><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>这事真是……
以前那里从来没有出现过怪物……
我觉得一定会有女孩在不知情的情况下来到温泉。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56795.zh-Hant:

56798.zh-Hant:

56822.en: <voice 03910_00056822><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>I'm Terrible Demon General Brenda!<stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56822.ja: <voice 03910_00056822><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>「私は　豪魔将ブレンダ！<stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56822.ko: <voice 03910_00056822><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>: 난 호마장 브렌다!<stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56823.en:
<voice 04030_00056823><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>We sisters, the Terrible Demon Generals, are under
Demon Marshal Zeldrad's orders to crush the Divine
Crimsonite in the shrine of these hot springs!<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56823.ja:
<voice 04030_00056823><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>「あたしたち　豪魔将シスターズは
　魔元帥ゼルドラドさまの命により　この温泉の
　ほこらにある　神の緋石を砕きにきたのさ！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56823.ko:
<voice 04030_00056823><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>: 우리 호마장 시스터즈는
　마원수 젤도라도 님의 명령으로 이 온천의
　성소에 있는 신의 붉은 돌을 파괴하러 왔다!<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56823.zh-Hans:
<voice 04030_00056823><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>我们豪魔将姐妹奉魔元帅杰尔德莱德之命，
来破坏这个温泉祠堂里的神之绯石！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56823.zh-Hant:
<voice 04030_00056823><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>我們豪魔將姊妹
是奉魔元帥傑爾德萊德大人之命，
來到這座溫泉的祠堂打碎神之緋石的！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56824.en:
<voice 04200_00056824><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>We were enjoying the hot springs, but now that the
Hero Princess is here, we've got work to do! Brenda!
Unlock the shriiine!!<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56824.ja:
<voice 04200_00056824><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>「思わず　温泉を楽しんじゃったけど
　勇者姫が来たからには　仕事を始めるよ！
　ブレンダ！　ほこらのカギを開けてきなっ！！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56824.ko:
<voice 04200_00056824><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>: 그만 온천욕에 정신이 팔렸지만
　용사 공주가 왔으니 할 일을 해야지!
　브렌다! 성소의 문을 열어 놔!!<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56824.zh-Hans:
<voice 04200_00056824><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>虽然我们一不小心就开始享受温泉，
但既然勇者公主来了，我们也要开始工作了！
普莲妲！去把祠堂的锁打开吧！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56824.zh-Hant:
<voice 04200_00056824><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>雖然泡湯泡得差點忘我，
不過勇者公主來了，那就該辦正事啦！
普蓮妲！去打開祠堂的門吧！！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56825.ja: <voice 04390_00056825><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>「がってん<heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56826.en: <voice 04655_00056826><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>As if I'd let you!<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56826.ja: <voice 04655_00056826><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「させるものですか！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56826.ko: <voice 04655_00056826><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그렇게 놔둘 것 같아!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56826.zh-Hans: <voice 04655_00056826><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>不会让你们得逞的！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56826.zh-Hant: <voice 04655_00056826><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>豈能讓妳們得逞！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56827.en: <voice 04715_00056827><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001><pc>! I'm going after them!!<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56827.ja: <voice 04715_00056827><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「<pc>！　追うわよ！！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56828.en: <voice 00070_00056828><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>Wait! I won't let you destroy the Divine Crimsonite!<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56828.ja:
<voice 00070_00056828><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「待ちなさい！
　あなたたちに　神の緋石を　壊させはしないわ！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56828.ko:
<voice 00070_00056828><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 기다려! 너희가
　신의 붉은 돌을 파괴하게 놔둘 것 같아!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56828.zh-Hans:
<voice 00070_00056828><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>站住！
我不会让你们破坏神之绯石的！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56828.zh-Hant:
<voice 00070_00056828><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>等一下！
我不會讓妳們破壞神之緋石的！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56829.en:
<voice 00110_00056829><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>Ahahahaha! That's so funny, y'know! She intends on
stopping us with that skinny body of hers!<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56829.ja:
<voice 00110_00056829><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>「あっはっはっはっは！
　笑っちゃうねぇ！　あんな細っこい身体で
　あたしたちを　止める気でいるよ！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56829.ko:
<voice 00110_00056829><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>: 아하하하하! 웃겨 죽겠네!
　저런 말라빠진 몸으로
　우릴 막을 생각인가 본데!?<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56829.zh-Hans:
<voice 00110_00056829><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>哈哈哈哈哈！
太可笑了！长得那么瘦小，
还妄图阻止我们！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56829.zh-Hant:
<voice 00110_00056829><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>啊哈哈哈哈！
笑死人了！竟然想用那麼瘦弱的身體
來阻止我們！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56830.en: <voice 00155_00056830><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>Teehee. You're saucy for a flat-chested giiirl <heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56830.ja:
<voice 00155_00056830><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>「うふふ。
　ぺったんこのくせに　ナマイキ～<heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56830.ko:
<voice 00155_00056830><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>: 우후후.
　납작 가슴 주제에 건방지네~<heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56830.zh-Hans:
<voice 00155_00056830><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>呵呵呵。
明明是个平胸还敢这么嚣张～<heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56830.zh-Hant:
<voice 00155_00056830><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>呵呵，
飛機場是在神氣什麼啊～～<heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56831.ja: <voice 00205_00056831><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「ぺ…　ぺったんこ…………？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56831.ko: <voice 00205_00056831><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 나… 납작 가슴…………?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56831.zh-Hant: <voice 00205_00056831><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>飛、飛機場……？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56832.en:
<voice 00295_00056832><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>We're, y'know... Different from the other monsters
around here!<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56832.ja:
<voice 00295_00056832><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>「あたしたちはねぇ……
　その辺の魔物とは　格が違うんだよ！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56832.ko:
<voice 00295_00056832><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>: 우린 말이지……
　여느 마물과는 차원이 다르다고!<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56832.zh-Hans:
<voice 00295_00056832><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>我们啊……
和那些随处可见的怪物根本不是一个级别的！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56832.zh-Hant:
<voice 00295_00056832><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>我們啊……
和那些雜魚怪物可不一樣！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56833.en:
<voice 00370_00056833><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>That's riiight. Making whatever attack as weak as a
novice's is our・po・wer <heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56833.ja:
<voice 00370_00056833><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>「そうよ～。
　どんな攻撃も　へなちょこにしちゃうのが
　私たちの　チ・カ・ラ<heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56833.ko:
<voice 00370_00056833><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>: 맞아~
　어떤 공격이든 무효화하는 게
　우리 힘・이・거・든<heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56833.zh-Hans:
<voice 00370_00056833><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>没错～
我们的能力就是
不管什么攻击都·不·怕<heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56833.zh-Hant:
<voice 00370_00056833><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>沒錯～～
把任何攻擊無效化就是我們的、力、量<heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56834.en:
<voice 00493_00056834><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>Even among the 4 Demon Generals, our strength is
said to be the most evil, how about we show you!
Let's go, Brenda!!<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56834.ja:
<voice 00493_00056834><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>「四魔将の中でも　最凶と言われる
　あたしたちの強さを　見せてやろうじゃないか！
　行くよ　ブレンダ！！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56834.ko:
<voice 00493_00056834><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>: 네 마장 중에서도 가장 악명 높은
　우리 자매의 힘을 보여 주겠어!
　가자, 브렌다!!<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56834.zh-Hans:
<voice 00493_00056834><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>在四魔将中我们可是最厉害的。
就让你们见识一下我们的力量吧！
上吧，普莲妲！！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56834.zh-Hant:
<voice 00493_00056834><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>就讓妳好好見識傳說在四魔將中
最兇狠的我們的強大吧！
要上了，普蓮妲！！<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56835.ja: <voice 00593_00056835><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>「がってん<heart><stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56836.en: <voice 00633_00056836><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, let's go! Let's protect the Divine Crimsonite!!<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56836.ja:
<voice 00633_00056836><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>！　行くわよ！
　神の緋石を　守りましょう！！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56836.ko:
<voice 00633_00056836><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>! 가자!
　신의 붉은 돌을 지키는 거야!!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56836.zh-Hans:
<voice 00633_00056836><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>！要上了！
我们要保护神之绯石！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56836.zh-Hant:
<voice 00633_00056836><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>！要上了！
一起守護神之緋石吧！！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56837.en: <voice 00030_00056837><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>N-no way......  We lost... To a flat-chested girl...<stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56837.ja:
<voice 00030_00056837><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>「ま　まさか……　私たちが　ぺったんこに
　負け……ちゃう……　なんて……。<stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56837.ko:
<voice 00030_00056837><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>: 서, 설마…… 우리가 납작 가슴한테
　질…… 줄이……야…….<stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56837.zh-Hans:
<voice 00030_00056837><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>怎、怎么可能……我们怎么会输给……
一个……平……胸……<stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56837.zh-Hant:
<voice 00030_00056837><start_lip_sync m50097 _normal m00001>不、不可能……我們竟然……
輸給……飛機……場……<stop_lip_animation m50097 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56838.en:
<voice 00090_00056838><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>Ku... Ugh... I wanted Master Madesagora... To see my
shining body... At the hot springs...<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56838.ja:
<voice 00090_00056838><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>「く……ぅ……　マデサゴーラさまに……
　温泉でみがいた……　あたしの肌を
　見て　いただきたかった……。<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56838.ko:
<voice 00090_00056838><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>: 크……윽…… 마데사고라 님께……
　온천욕으로 가꾼…… 내 피부를
　보여드리고 싶었는데…….<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56838.zh-Hans:
<voice 00090_00056838><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>啊……呜……我还想给……
马蒂桑贡拉大人……看看……
我经过温泉滋润的皮肤……<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56838.zh-Hant:
<voice 00090_00056838><start_lip_sync m50096 _normal m00001>呃……唔……我還想讓……
馬德沙葛拉大人……
看看我泡完湯後滑嫩的肌膚……<stop_lip_animation m50096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56839.en: <voice 00350_00056839><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>.........I'm not flat-chested.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56839.ja: <voice 00350_00056839><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「………………ぺったんこじゃないもん。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56839.ko: <voice 00350_00056839><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: ………………난 납작 가슴이 아니라고.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56839.zh-Hans: <voice 00350_00056839><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……我不是平胸。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56839.zh-Hant: <voice 00350_00056839><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……我才不是飛機場。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56840.en:
<voice 00430_00056840><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, thank you. Right away, I'll pour my
Hero Power into the Divine Crimsonite.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56840.ja:
<voice 00430_00056840><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>　ありがとう。
　さっそく　神の緋石に
　勇者のチカラを　注ぎ込みましょう。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56840.ko:
<voice 00430_00056840><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 고마워.
　어서 신의 붉은 돌에
　용사의 힘을 불어넣자.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56840.zh-Hans:
<voice 00430_00056840><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，谢谢。
我们赶快向神之绯石里
注入勇者之力吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56840.zh-Hant:
<voice 00430_00056840><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>謝謝你，<cs_pchero>。
那我馬上把勇者的力量
注入神之緋石。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56841.en:
<voice 01050_00056841><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>...With that, the Divine Crimsonite here has regained its
ancient, divine power. Now, even Great Demon King
himself shouldn't be able to meddle with it.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56841.ja:
<voice 01050_00056841><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「……これで　ここの神の緋石は
　神代のチカラを取り戻したわ。
　もう　大魔王にも　手出しはできないはずよ。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56841.ko:
<voice 01050_00056841><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: ……이걸로 이 신의 붉은 돌은
　신대의 힘을 되찾았어.
　이제 대마왕도 손댈 수 없을 거야.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56841.zh-Hans:
<voice 01050_00056841><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……这下这里的神之绯石
就恢复神代之力了。
大魔王也不能动这块绯石了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56841.zh-Hant:
<voice 01050_00056841><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……這樣子，這裡的神之緋石
就恢復了神代之力。
大魔王應該也無法出手了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56843.en:
<voice 01165_00056843><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>Ah, let's go back to Melun Waterwheel to tell the old
man that we defeated the monsters.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56843.ja:
<voice 01165_00056843><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「あ　メルン水車郷に戻って
　おじいさんに　魔物を倒したことを
　伝えてあげなきゃ。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56843.ko:
<voice 01165_00056843><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 아, 메른 물레방앗골로 돌아가서
　할아버지께 마물을 쓰러뜨렸다고
　말씀드려야겠다.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56843.zh-Hans:
<voice 01165_00056843><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>啊，得回梅伦水车乡
告诉老爷爷
我们已经打倒怪物了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56843.zh-Hant:
<voice 01165_00056843><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>啊，得回梅倫水車鄉
告訴爺爺
我們打倒怪物了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56844.en:
<voice 00103_00056844><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>Ooh, <pc>! That sunny expression... Maybe you
defeated the monsters that appeared in the hot
springs for me?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56844.ja:
<voice 00103_00056844><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「おおっ　<pc>さん！
　晴れやかな　その表情……　もしや
　温泉に現れた魔物を　倒してくださったのか？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56844.ko:
<voice 00103_00056844><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc> 씨!
　그 밝은 표정은…… 설마
　온천에 나타난 마물을 해치운 겐가?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56844.zh-Hans:
<voice 00103_00056844><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>哦哦，<pc>！
你一脸舒畅的表情……难道说
你打倒了出现在温泉的怪物？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56844.zh-Hant:
<voice 00103_00056844><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>！
看你那暢快的表情……
你們打倒出現在溫泉的怪物了嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56846.en:
<voice 00143_00056846><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>Ooh-hoo-hoo! So it's just as I thought! However...
Why would such evil, ferocious monsters come to the
hot springs?<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56846.ja:
<voice 00143_00056846><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「おおっ！　やはり　そうじゃったか！
　しかし……なぜ　あんな　邪悪で凶暴な魔物が
　温泉に来たんじゃろうなぁ？<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56846.ko:
<voice 00143_00056846><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 오오! 역시 그랬군!
　하지만…… 왜 그런 사악하고
　흉포한 마물이 온천에 나타난 거지?<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56846.zh-Hans:
<voice 00143_00056846><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>哦哦！果然是这样啊！
但是……那么邪恶凶暴的怪物
为什么会到温泉来呢？<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56846.zh-Hant:
<voice 00143_00056846><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>喔喔！果然是如此！
不過……為什麼那麼邪惡又殘暴的怪物
會來溫泉呢？<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56845.en:
<voice 00260_00056845><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>MM-MM!? I don't have tunnel-vision, do I! To protect
the gals, you defeated the monsters that appeared at
Monsero Hot Spring Ravine?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56845.ja:
<voice 00260_00056845><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「むむっ！？　わしの目は　フシ穴ではないぞい！
　ギャルたちを守るため　モンセロ温泉峡の
　温泉に現れた魔物を　倒してくれたんじゃろう？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56845.ko:
<voice 00260_00056845><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 응!? 내 눈은 장식이 아닐세!
　걸들을 지키기 위해 몽세로 온천골의
　온천에 나타난 마물을 해치운 게지?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56845.zh-Hans:
<voice 00260_00056845><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>嗯？！我的眼光不会有错！
为了保护女孩子们，你已经打倒了在
蒙赛罗温泉峡谷的温泉出现的怪物吧？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56845.zh-Hant:
<voice 00260_00056845><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>唔唔！？我可沒瞎！
為了守護辣妹們，你們打倒在蒙賽羅溫泉峽谷的
溫泉裡出現的怪物了吧？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56847.en:
<voice 00335_00056847><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>...What!? They came to destroy the Divine Crimsonite
enshrined within the hot springs, you say?<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56847.ja:
<voice 00335_00056847><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「……なにっ！？
　あの温泉の　ほこらに祀られた
　神の緋石を壊すために　来たじゃと？<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56847.ko:
<voice 00335_00056847><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: ……뭐라!?
　그 온천의 성소에 모셔져 있는
　신의 붉은 돌을 파괴하기 위해서라고?<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56847.zh-Hans:
<voice 00335_00056847><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>……什么？！
它们是来破坏供奉在那个温泉的
祠堂里的神之绯石？<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56847.zh-Hant:
<voice 00335_00056847><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>……什麼！？
是為了破壞
供奉在溫泉祠堂裡的神之緋石？<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56848.en:
<voice 00385_00056848><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>My, Divine Crimsonite you say? So, back then... The
fairy tales my grammy used to tell me were true, were
they.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56848.ja:
<voice 00385_00056848><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>「まあ。神の緋石ですって？
　それでは　昔……　ばあさまに聞かせてもらった
　おとぎ話は　本当のことだったのねえ。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56848.ko:
<voice 00385_00056848><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>: 세상에, 신의 붉은 돌이라고요?
　그렇다면 예전에…… 할머니가 들려주신
　옛날이야기가 진짜였던 모양이네요.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56848.zh-Hans:
<voice 00385_00056848><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>你说神之绯石？
那么说的话，以前……奶奶告诉我的神话
都是真的了。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56848.zh-Hant:
<voice 00385_00056848><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>哎呀！你說神之緋石？
這麼說，
我以前聽奶奶說的故事是真的了。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56849.en:
<voice 00550_00056849><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>"The gods, to protect the world above, left a sacred
stone"... This Divine Crimsonite is what we all have
been carefully protecting.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56849.ja:
<voice 00550_00056849><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>「ほこらには　神さまが　地上を守るために
　残してくれた聖なる石……神の緋石があって
　私たちが　大切に　お守りしてきたのよって。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56849.ko:
<voice 00550_00056849><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>: 성소에는 신께서 지상을 지키기 위해 남겨 두신
　성스러운 돌…… 신의 붉은 돌이 있는데
　그걸 우리가 소중하게 지켜 왔다고 하셨죠.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56849.zh-Hans:
<voice 00550_00056849><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>奶奶说神为了守护地上的世界
留下了神圣的石头……也就是神之绯石，
她们一直小心地守护着绯石。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56849.zh-Hant:
<voice 00550_00056849><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>奶奶說，祠堂裡有神明為了守護人間
而留下的神聖之石……神之緋石，
大家一直慎重地守護著石頭。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56850.en:
<voice 00635_00056850><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>We, the hot springs' caretakers, over many months and
years forgot our duty... We became ordinary hot spring
caretakers, didn't we.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56850.ja:
<voice 00635_00056850><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>「私たち　温泉の守り人は
　長い年月の中で　その役目を忘れ……
　ただの温泉管理人に　なってしまったのねえ。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56850.ko:
<voice 00635_00056850><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>: 우리 온천 수호자는
　오랜 세월 속에서 그 사명을 잊고……
　그저 온천 관리인으로 전락했던 거로군요.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56850.zh-Hans:
<voice 00635_00056850><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>我们这些温泉的守护人
在漫长的岁月中忘记了自己的责任……
变成了普通的温泉管理人。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56850.zh-Hant:
<voice 00635_00056850><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>我們溫泉守護者
在漫長的歲月中忘了這份職責……
變成了普通的溫泉管理人。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56851.en:
<voice 00705_00056851><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>But, having this remind us of our duty, from now on
I have to raise a worthy successor to protect the Divine
Crimsonite...<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56851.ja:
<voice 00705_00056851><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>「でも　これで　自分たちの役目を思いだせたし
　これからは　神の緋石を守っていくために
　しっかりとした後継者を　育てなくては……。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56851.ko:
<voice 00705_00056851><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>: 하지만 이제 우리의 사명을 기억해냈으니
　앞으로는 신의 붉은 돌을 지킬 수 있도록
　번듯한 후계자를 키워야겠어요…….<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56851.zh-Hans:
<voice 00705_00056851><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>但是这下我们也想起了自己的责任，
为了今后能继续守护神之绯石，
我们要好好培养继承人才行……<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56851.zh-Hant:
<voice 00705_00056851><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>不過，既然想起了自己該做的事，
今後我也要為了能夠守護神之緋石
好好培育後繼者才行……<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56852.en:
<voice 00767_00056852><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001><pc>, really, thank you for your help. This is a
token of our gratitude. Now, please accept it!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56852.ja:
<voice 00767_00056852><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん。ほんに　世話になったのう。
　これは　わしらからの　感謝のしるしじゃ。
　さあ　受け取ってくれい！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56852.ko:
<voice 00767_00056852><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨, 정말 신세가 많았네.
　이건 우리가 주는 답례일세.
　자, 받게나!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56852.zh-Hans:
<voice 00767_00056852><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001><pc>，这次你真是帮了我们很多忙。
这是我们感谢你的证明。
来，请收下吧！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56852.zh-Hant:
<voice 00767_00056852><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001><pc>，真是幫了我們大忙。
這是我們給你的謝禮，
你收下吧！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！

56853.en:
<voice 00925_00056853><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001><pc>, Yakup, truly, thank you so very much.
Please come visit me at the hot springs again, okay.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56853.ja:
<voice 00925_00056853><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん。ヤクプさん。
　本当に　ありがとうございました。
　また　温泉の方にも　遊びにきてくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56853.ko:
<voice 00925_00056853><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨, 야쿠프 씨.
　정말 고마워요.
　온천에도 또 놀러들 와요.<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56853.zh-Hans:
<voice 00925_00056853><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001><pc>、雅库普。
真的非常感谢。
请再到温泉来玩吧。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56853.zh-Hant:
<voice 00925_00056853><start_lip_sync n02230 _normal m00001><pc>、雅各布，
真的非常謝謝你們。
下次請一定要來溫泉玩喔。<stop_lip_animation n02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56854.en: <voice 01145_00056854><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>Rugina's gone, eh. It's going to be a wee bit lonely...<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56854.ja:
<voice 01145_00056854><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「ルジナちゃんが　行ってしまったか。
　ちょっぴり　さみしくなるのう……。<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56854.ko:
<voice 01145_00056854><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 루지나가 가 버렸구먼.
　조금 적적해지겠어…….<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56854.zh-Hans:
<voice 01145_00056854><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>卢吉娜走了啊。
有点寂寞呢……<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56854.zh-Hant:
<voice 01145_00056854><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>盧吉娜走了嗎？
有點寂寞啊……<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000197.en:
<voice 01185_29000197><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>But, now that the hot springs are peaceful, the gals
should come rushing in with their chit-chatting and
"teehee"s!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000197.ja:
<voice 01185_29000197><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「じゃが　あの温泉が　平和になった今
　これまで通り　ギャルたちが押し寄せて
　キャッキャうふふに　なるはずじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000197.ko:
<voice 01185_29000197><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 하지만 이제 그 온천도 평화로워졌으니
　예전처럼 걸들이 몰려들어
　꺄르르 꺄르르 이야기꽃을 피우겠구먼!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000197.zh-Hans:
<voice 01185_29000197><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>不过，那个温泉如今又变得和平，
女孩们应该会跟过去一样
蜂拥而至，玩得不亦乐乎！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000197.zh-Hant:
<voice 01185_29000197><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>不過，那個溫泉現在已經恢復和平，
辣妹們應該又會跟過去一樣蜂擁而至，
玩得不亦樂乎！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56856.en:
<voice 01215_00056856><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>Hehehe <heart> Before long, I'll try going to Monsero Hot
Springs! <pc>, really, thank yaaa!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56856.ja:
<voice 01215_00056856><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>「うぷぷぷ<heart>　また近いうちに
　モンセロ温泉峡の温泉へ　行くとするかの！
　<pc>さん　本当に　ありがとうな～！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56856.ko:
<voice 01215_00056856><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>: 으큭큭큭<heart> 조만간 또
　몽세로 온천골의 온천에 가 볼까!
　<pc> 씨, 정말 고맙네~!<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56856.zh-Hans:
<voice 01215_00056856><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>呵呵呵<heart>近期我再去一趟
蒙赛罗温泉峡谷的温泉吧！
<pc>，真是谢谢你！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56856.zh-Hant:
<voice 01215_00056856><start_lip_sync n02229 _normal m00001>唔噗噗噗<heart>
近期再去一趟蒙賽羅溫泉峽谷的溫泉吧！
<pc>，真的太感謝你啦～～！<stop_lip_animation n02229 CLOSE_MOUTH>
